questions.prompt: Which tag should surround an entire table of data?
Which tag adds new data to a HTML table?
Which of the following tags is used to separate the body of a table from its headers and footers?
Which of the following tags is used to enclose the row of a table containing its headers?
Which tag creates new rows in a HTML table?
Which tag adds a new row header to a HTML table?
What is the name of the tag used to separate the footer of a table from its body?
How many columns does the following table row span altogether? Out of Town Back in Town

questions.answer: w: black, x: table rows and cells, y: blue, z: table headers
